title: Besiktas, Fenerbahce, Galatasaray to race for Dortmund's Emre Can: Report - Türkiye Today
snippet: German international midfielder of Turkish origin Emre Can, currently playing for Borussia Dortmund in the Bundesliga, has reportedly drawn interest from Türkiye’s three leading football clubs: Besiktas, Fenerbahce and Galatasaray, according ...

title: Emre Can prepares his farewell to Borussia Dortmund | Fichajes.net
snippet: ▪️The three Turkish giants are preparing official bids in January for the 31‑year‑old defender. pic.twitter.com/ZdqEpJkHi2 — Ekrem KONUR (@Ekremkonur) December 7, 2025 · Within Borussia Dortmund, the renewal of the player is not ruled out, but it also does not seem to be a priority. The continuity of Emre Can depends largely on the club's sports objectives, especially regarding their qualification for European competitions. If the team fails to secure international presence for the next season, the management could opt to reduce the wage bill and rejuvenate the squad, decisions that would directly impact the captain's future.
